ğ“¼ ğ“ˆ– ğ“ƒ€ ğ“ ğ“…± ğ“¸ ğ“€­ ğ“ª | Pwenet | ?

Ill defined locative, sometimes over-localized as Ethyopia, Somalia, Djibouti, Horn of Africa, more correctly "frontier" or land of the Phoenixians.

According to Homer Phoenicians came from the Red Sea, thus linking them with Punt.
